name: CreatePagerdutyUser
description:
Create a new user in PagerDuty for account interaction.

Use this tool to create a new user in a PagerDuty account. Users can interact with incidents and other data. Requires appropriate OAuth permissions.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: The versioning header for the API request. Use to specify the API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Set the 'Content-Type' header to specify the media type of the request body. Use 'application/json'.

parameters.name: requester_email
parameters.description: The email of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

parameters.name: new_user_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the user to be created, including fields such as name, email, and role.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
